name: Indigenous Animals Harvesting and Meat Processing Grant Program
objective: This program will provide funds to Tribal governments as defined by the Federally Recognized Indian Tribe List Act (List Act) of 1994 (Pub. L. No. 103-454), their wholly owned arms and instrumentalities, or joint or multi tribal government entities. These funds will address needs for local animal protein processing capacity in Tribal communities and indigenous foods supply chains.
applicant_types: Nonprofit with 501C3 IRS Status (Other than Institution of Higher Education)

results.description: This funding was awarded to a single entity, a Native American CDFI through a Cooperative Agreement, and subsequent sub-award grants have been awarded to 12 Tribes.
